verbs.description: TBS [V: has] removed Samantha Bee 's entire offensive " Full Frontal with Samantha Bee 's " episode , which featured comments by the host who called Ivanka Trump a " feckless c**t , " according to The Wrap . What 's a brief history ? During the Wednesday airing of Bee 's show , she called Ivanka Trump a " feckless c**t . " She also suggested that President Donald Trump 's daughter use her feminine charms and sexuality to sway her father 's policies . On Thursday , Bee apologized for the comment , saying , " I would like to sincerely apologize to Ivanka Trump and to my viewers to using an expletive on my show to describe her last night . " " It was inappropriate and inexcusable , " she added . " I crossed a line and I deeply regret it . " TBS also apologized , saying , " Samantha Bee has taken the right action in apologizing for the vile and inappropriate language she used about Ivanka Trump last night . Those words should not have been aired . It was our mistake too , and we …
